name: General Issue or Question
description: Report issues, ask questions, or suggest improvements
title: [EMD] General Issue:

field_guidance.issue_summary:
**Provide a clear, concise summary.**

**Include:**
- What you're trying to do
- What went wrong (if error)
- What you expected vs what happened

**Issue types:**
- Error during submission
- Question about EMD specification
- Suggestion for new CV entry
- Documentation unclear
- Feature request
field_guidance.issue_details:
**Provide relevant details:**

**For errors:**
- Steps to reproduce
- Error messages
- Which template/entity
- Example data (if applicable)

**For questions:**
- Context of your use case
- What you've already tried
- Links to relevant entities/issues
- Reference to EMD specification section if applicable

**For CV suggestions:**
- Why the new term is needed
- Definition following EMD CV style
- Which models would use it

**For documentation:**
- Which section is unclear
- What information is missing
- Suggestions for improvement
field_guidance.affected_entities:
**If applicable, list entity IDs:**

**Entity types and ID formats:**
- model: source_id (e.g., cnrm-esm2-1)
- model_family: family name (e.g., cnrm-cm)
- component: component_id (e.g., arpege-climat-version-6-3)
- component_config: {domain}_{component}_{h_grid}_{v_grid}
- horizontal_computational_grid: c### (e.g., c100)
- vertical_computational_grid: v### (e.g., v100)
- horizontal_subgrid: s### (e.g., s100)

**Helps us:**
- Understand context
- Reproduce issues
- Provide specific help

**Leave blank if:**
- General question
- Not related to specific entities
